itemInfo.itemDesc: The byproduct of failed alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: This can be obtained when you fail to synthesize an Alchemy Stone.

item.name: Shining Powder
item.desc:
The byproduct of successful alchemy.
- How to Obtain: There is a small chance this can be obtained after successful alchemy.

This is used for crafting Alchemy Stones.

item.name: Shining Powder
item.desc:
The byproduct of successful alchemy.
- How to Obtain: There is a small chance this can be obtained after successful alchemy.

This is used for crafting Alchemy Stones.

item.name: Sinner's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Powder of Time
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.
